videos.title: Piña Colada In A Pineapple
videos.description:
Get the pineapple corer here: http://bit.ly/2xhqHbQ
Heads up, BuzzFeed makes a bit of profit if you purchase through this link!

Piña Colada in a Pineapple 
Servings: 4

INGREDIENTS 
1 pineapple
1 cup coconut cream 
¼ cup coconut milk 
1 cup white rum 
3 cups ice
Juice of 1 lime

Special Equipment
Pineapple corer 

PREPARATION
1. Using a pineapple corer, core the pineapple and slice the pineapple into chunks. 
2. Place the pineapple chunks flat on a baking sheet and freeze solid, about 2 hours. 
3. In a blender, add the frozen pineapple, coconut cream, coconut milk, white rum, ice, and lime juice. 
4. Place the blender back in the freezer for 20 minutes or until thickened. 
5. Blend one more time until fully incorporated. 
6. Pour piña colada back into the pineapple. 
7. Top with a maraschino cherry and enjoy! 

Inspired by:
http://www.bonappetit.com/recipe/bas-best-pina-colada


Check us out on Facebook! - facebook.com/buzzfeedtasty

MUSIC
I See You_Undrscr
Licensed via Warner Chappell Production Music Inc.

videos.title: Rosé Cocktails 4 Ways
videos.description:
Here is what you'll need!

Sparkling Rosé Sangria
Servings: 4

Ingredients
1 bottle sparkling rosé
1 lemon, sliced
1 lime, sliced
1 grapefruit, sliced
1 cup brandy
1 cup grapefruit juice
¾ cup simple syrup

Preparation
1. In a large pitcher or bowl, combine fruit,  grapefruit juice, brandy, and simple syrup. 
2. Stir well, cover with plastic wrap, and chill for at least 1 hour.
3. Top with sparkling rosé, serve, and enjoy! 


Rosarita 
Servings: 4

Ingredients
1 cup tequila
1 cup lime juice
½  cup simple syrup
1 bottle rosé
Ice, to serve
1 lime, sliced into wedge
Pink Himalayan salt, to serve

Preparation
1. In a pitcher or large bowl, add  tequila, lime juice, simple syrup, and rosé. Stir to combine.
2. Pour the Himalayan salt into a shallow dish. Wet the rim of the servings glasses, and dip each into the salt. 
3. Add ice to each serving glass, then top with the rosé margarita (rosarita). 
4. Serve with a lime wedge, and enjoy! 


Frosé Daiquiri 
Servings: 4

Ingredients
1 cup strawberries, frozen
¾ cup rum
½ cup lime juice
¼ cup sugar
1 bottle rosé, frozen
4 strawberries, to serve

Preparation
1. Add the frozen strawberries, lime juice, rum, sugar, and frozen rosé to a blender and blend until fully mixed. You may have to do this in two batches.
2. Divide between four glasses, and garnish with a strawberry. 
3. Enjoy!

Peach Rosito 
Servings: 4

Ingredients
2 peaches, 1 pitted and finely chopped, 1 thinly sliced
1 cup mint leaves
½ cup sugar
¼ cup lime juice
½ cup white rum
1 bottle rosé

Preparation
1. In a pitcher add diced peaches, mint, sugar, and lime juice. 2.Mudlle for 1 minute, or until sugar has dissolved. 
3. To the pitcher add rum and rose. Stir to combine. 
4. Add ice to each serving glass, then top with the rosé mojito (rosito).  
5. Add a peach slice to the rim of each glass, and enjoy!

Check us out on Facebook! - facebook.com/buzzfeedtasty

Credits: https://www.buzzfeed.com/bfmp/videos/22969


MUSIC
Licensed via Audio Network

videos.title: Color-Changing Frozen Mojito
videos.description:
Check out the Tasty One-Stop Shop for cookbooks, aprons, hats, and more at TastyShop.com: http://bit.ly/2mEBY0e


Here is what you'll need!

Color-changing Mojito
Servings: 4

INGREDIENTS
For Blue Ice
3 cups water
3 ounces red cabbage, julienned
1 cup sugar

For Lime Ice
½ cup lime juice
1½ cups water
10 mint leaves
2 tablespoons white rum

PREPARATION
1. Add water and red cabbage to a medium-size pot. Bring the water to a boil, then strain the cabbage in a sieve over a bowl to reserve the blue liquid.
2. Pour the strained blue water into an ice tray. You will be left with 1 cup of blue water. Reserve the water and free the ice tray for 6 hours, to overnight.
3. Add the reserved blue water to a pot with the sugar and bring to a boil until the sugar has dissolved. Set aside.
4. Combine the lime juice with 1½ cups of water and stir to combine. Pour the lime mixture into an ice tray and freeze for 6 hours, up to overnight.
5. Add the blue ice cubes to a blender and blend until finely crushed. Put the crushed blue ice in a glass.
6. Wash the blender well. Add the lime ice cubes and mint leaves. Blend until finely crushed. Put the crushed lime and mint ice on top of the blue ice.
7. Slowly pour the white rum and blue simple syrup. Top with a sprig of mint.
8. Enjoy!

Check us out on Facebook! - facebook.com/buzzfeedtasty

Credits: https://www.buzzfeed.com/bfmp/videos/21173

Source info: https://web.stanford.edu/~ajspakow/downloads/outreach/ph-student-9-30-09.pdf


MUSIC
Licensed via Audio Network

videos.title: Spiked Lemonade 4 Ways
videos.description:
Check out the Tasty One-Stop Shop for cookbooks, aprons, hats, and more at TastyShop.com: http://bit.ly/2mEBY0e

Here is what you'll need!

Strawberry Lemonade
Servings: 10-12

INGREDIENTS
5 cups water
1 cup lemon juice
⅔ cup sugar
1 cup strawberry puree
7 leaves of basil, chopped
2 cups vodka

PREPARATION
1. Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher and stir until sugar has dissolved.
2. Once combined, refrigerate for 3 hours or until the drink is cold.
3. Serve with ice and the fruit of your choice.
4. Enjoy!

---

Mango Pineapple Lemonade
Servings: 10-12

INGREDIENTS
5 cups water
1 cup lemon juice
⅔ cup sugar
1 cup mango nectar
½ cup pineapple juice
2 cups vodka

PREPARATION
1. Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher and stir until sugar has dissolved.
2. Once combined, refrigerate for 3 hours or until the drink is cold.
3. Serve with ice and the fruit of your choice.
4. Enjoy!

---

Limeade
Servings: 10-12

INGREDIENTS
5 cups water
1 cup lime juice
⅔ cup sugar
4 sprigs of mint, chopped
2 cups vodka

PREPARATION
1. Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher and stir until sugar has dissolved.
2. Once combined, refrigerate for 3 hours or until the drink is cold.
3. Serve with ice and the fruit of your choice.
4. Enjoy!

---

Raspberry Peach Lemonade
Servings: 10-12

INGREDIENTS
5 cups of water
1 cup lemon juice
⅔ cup sugar
⅓ cup raspberry puree, strained
⅓ cup peach puree, strained
2 cups vodka

PREPARATION
1. Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher and stir until sugar has dissolved.
2. Once combined, refrigerate for 3 hours or until the drink is cold.
3. Serve with ice and the fruit of your choice.
4. Enjoy!

Check us out on Facebook! - facebook.com/buzzfeedtasty

Credits: https://www.buzzfeed.com/bfmp/videos/22003

videos.title: Pomegranate Champagne Spritzer
videos.description:
Here is what you'll need!

Pomegranate Champagne Spritzer
Servings: 6 

INGREDIENTS
½ pomegranate
½ lemon
½ cup water
Champagne 

PREPARATION
1. Cut the pomegranate in half, and hit it over a bowl with a wooden spoon to release the seeds. 
2. Squeeze half a lemon over the pomegranate seeds. 
3. Pour a half cup of water over the seeds and lemon juice, and spoon the mixture into ice tray of choice. 
4. Freeze the cubes for an hour or until solid. 
5. In a glass, put one cube and then top with champagne. 
6. Watch the drink transform while the ice cube melts. 
7. Enjoy! 


Check us out on Facebook! - facebook.com/buzzfeedtasty

MUSIC
Lady Lago_Full
Licensed via Warner Chappell Production Music Inc.

Made by BFMP www.buzzfeed.com/videoteam.

videos.title: Spiced Wine Fire Punch
videos.description:
Customize & buy the Tasty Cookbook here: http://bzfd.it/2fpfeu5

Here is what you'll need!

Spiced Wine Fire Punch
Serves: 4


INGREDIENTS
2 oranges, juiced (or 1 cup orange juice)
2 apples
1 cup (¼ liter) hard cider
4 cups (1 liter) wine, red
1 teaspoon cloves
8 sticks cinnamon


Sugar cubes
151 Bacardi rum, as needed
Sugar, to taste
 
 PREPARATION
Cut oranges in half and juice. 
Pour red wine in a large pot. Add the orange juice through a sieve to get rid of pulp.
Add cider, cloves and half the cinnamon sticks and bring to a simmer, but do not boil. 
Cut apple in ⅓ - ½ inch (1 cm) slices, leaving the peel on and the star in the middle intact. Put the center slices with a star aside and add the rest of the ends to the punch.
To serve, pour punch in a heat resistant glass.
Take the center slices with the inner star shape and clean the holes of the seeds and tough lining, making sure to keep the star shape intact.  
Carefully place the apple slice on the punch, so it floats on top.
Pour a little bit of the rum in a glass, heat-safe dish. Have another glass nearby to hold the spoon you will use to move the sugar to the apple. 
Soak sugar cube in rum and place it over the star in the glass. 
Carefully, with a lighter, set sugar cube on fire until you see the sugar bubbling and a blue flame. 
If necessary, carefully add small amounts of rum on the sugar cube with a spoon to keep it burning until the sugar is melted.
Stir with a cinnamon stick and enjoy immediately while it is still hot. If not sweet enough, repeat sugar cube flaming step or add more sugar to the hot drink.

---------------------------------
German:

Apfel-Feuerzangenbowle 
Für 4 Personen

ZUTATEN
Saft von 2 Orangen
2 Äpfel
¼ Liter Cidre
1 Liter Wein, rot
1 TL Nelken
8 Stangen Zimt

Zuckerwürfel
Rum (mindestens 54%), je nach Bedarf 
Zucker, nach Geschmack

ZUBEREITUNG
1. Orangen halbieren und auspressen.
2. Den Rotwein in einen mittelgroßen Topf geben. Den Fruchtsaft durch ein Sieb hinzugeben, um das Fruchtfleisch zu entfernen.
3. Cidre, Nelken und die Hälfte der Zimtstangen dazugeben und zum Sieden bringen, aber nicht kochen.
4. Apfel in 0,5 cm bis 1 cm dicke Scheiben schneiden, aber Schale und Stern in der Mitte intakt lassen. Die mittleren Scheiben mit einem sichtbaren Stern beiseite legen und die restlichen Enden in die Bowle geben.
5. Zum Servieren die Bowle in ein hitzebeständiges Glas füllen. 
6. In den mittleren Scheiben mit Stern, die Löcher von Kernen und hartem Belag befreien, den Stern aber intakt lassen.
7. Die Apfelscheibe vorsichtig auf die Bowle geben, so dass sie schwimmt.
8. Einen Zuckerwürfel in Rum tränken und im Glas in der Mitte des Apfels platzieren.
9. Mit einem Stabfeuerzeug den Zuckerwürfel vorsichtig anzünden, bis er Blasen schlägt und man eine bläuliche Flamme sieht. 
10. Wenn nötig, vorsichtig mit einem Löffel Rum nachgießen, bis der Zucker vollständig geschmolzen ist.
11. Mit einer Zimtstange gut umrühren und heiß genießen. Wem es noch nicht zu süß ist, der kann den Schmelzvorgang mit dem Zucker wiederholen oder einfach mehr Zucker in das heiße Getränk geben.



Check us out on Facebook! - facebook.com/buzzfeedtasty

MUSIC
ANW1438_05_Trick-or-Treat
Licensed via Audio Network

Made by BFMP www.buzzfeed.com/videoteam.

videos.title: Berry Vodka Sunrise
videos.description:
BERRY VODKA SUNRISE 
Yield: 10 servings

INGREDIENTS
3 cups vodka
3 cups orange juice 
3 cups sparkling water 
1 ½ cups mixed berries
1 ½ cups tart cherry juice
1 ½ cups maraschino cherry liquid (¼ cup grenadine will work as a substitute)
Fresh orange slices and maraschino cherries to garnish


PREPARATION
1. Combine vodka, orange juice, and sparkling water in a pitcher.
2. Stir in the fresh oranges and set aside. 
3. Puree mixed berries, tart cherry juice, and maraschino cherry liquid in a blender or food processor.
4. Strain the purée through a sieve into a separate pitcher. 
5. When ready to serve, pour orange vodka mixture into a glass of ice, leaving some room. 
6. Top off the drink with the berry liquid and watch it settle to the bottom. 
7. Garnish with an orange and maraschino cherry. 

Recipe by Jessica Maroney

MUSIC

Summers On The Block
Licensed via Warner Chappell Production Music Inc.

videos.title: Mango Kiwi Pineapple Sangria
videos.description:
MANGO KIWI PINEAPPLE SANGRIA
Servings: 6


INGREDIENTS
3 small mangos, diced
3 kiwis, peeled and sliced
1 cup coconut rum
750 milliliters white wine
2 cups pineapple juice
1 cup soda water

PREPARATION
1. In a pitcher, pour the coconut rum over the mango and kiwi.  Chill for 1 hour.
2. Pour in the rest of the ingredients and stir.
3. Enjoy!

All music provided by Audio Network and Warner Chappell Inc.  Used with permission

videos.title: Boozy Orange 50/50 Milkshake
videos.description:
RECIPE:
Boozy Orange 50/50 Milkshake
Servings: 4 

INGREDIENTS
1 orange, cut into slices for garnish
8 scoops vanilla ice cream
1 can frozen orange juice concentrate
½ cup vanilla-flavored vodka
¼ cup orange liqueur

PREPARATION
 1. Cut the orange into slices and set aside for garnish.
 2. In a blender, add 4 scoops of ice cream, orange juice concentrate, vodka, and orange liqueur. Blend until well-combined.
 3. Add the remaining 4 scoops of ice cream and blend.
 4. Pour into a glass and garnish with an orange slice.
 5. Serve & enjoy!

Music provided by Audio Network. Used with permission

videos.title: Sangria 4 Ways
videos.description:
Strawberry Lemonade Sangria
Servings: 6-8

INGREDIENTS
2 pounds strawberries, sliced
1 lemon, sliced
1 bottle white wine
1 cup white rum
4 cups lemonade
2 cups champagne
Lemon slices for garnish

PREPARATION
 1. In a large pitcher, combine the strawberries, lemon, wine, rum, and lemonade.
 2. Stir until mixed.
 3. Chill for at least 4 hours.
 4. Add the champagne, then serve with a lemon slice on each glass!


Mixed Berry Sangria
Servings:  6-8

INGREDIENTS
1 cup blackberries
1 cup strawberries, sliced
1 cup blueberries
1 bottle red wine
1 cup brandy
3 cups apple juice
2 cups lemon-lime soda
Strawberries for garnish

PREPARATION
 1. In a large pitcher, combine the blackberries, strawberries, blueberries, red wine, brandy, and apple juice.
 2. Stir until mixed.
 3. Chill for at least 4 hours.
 4. Add the lemon-lime soda, then serve with a strawberry on each glass!





Mango Pineapple Sangria
Servings: 6-8

INGREDIENTS
2 cups pineapple, diced
3 mangos, diced
1 bottle red wine
1 cup brandy
3 cups pineapple juice
2 cups orange soda
Pineapple wedges for garnish

PREPARATION
 1. In a large pitcher, combine the pineapples, mangoes, wine, brandy, and pineapple juice.
 2. Stir until mixed.
 3. Chill for at least 4 hours.
 4. Add the soda, then serve with a pineapple wedge on each glass!


Raspberry Peach Sangria
Servings:  6-8

INGREDIENTS
3 white peaches, sliced
2 cups raspberries
1 bottle rosé
1 cup white rum
4 cups peach nectar
1 cup champagne
Peach slices for garnish

PREPARATION
 5. In a large pitcher, combine the peaches, raspberries, rosé, rum, and peach nectar.
 6. Stir until mixed.
 7. Chill for at least 4 hours.
 8. Add the champagne, then serve with a peach slice on each glass!








Music provided by Warner Chappell Inc. Used with permission

videos.title: Bubbly Popsicles
videos.description:
Here is what you'll need! 

Servings: 6 


INGREDIENTS 
1/2 cup strawberries
1/2 cup diced pineapple
1/2 cup ginger ale
1 lime, cut into wedges
6 popsicle sticks
1 bottle champagne or sparkling wine


PREPARATION 
1.In a large bowl, combine strawberries and diced pineapple. 
2. Mash fruit with a muddler (you can use a fork or back of a spoon!). 
3. Add the ginger ale and sir. 
4. Using plastic shot glasses, add one lime wedge into the bottom and fill each glass with the fruit mixture. 
5. Freeze for 8 hours or until completely solid. 
6. Add one popsicle to your favorite kind of sparkling wine or champagne. 
7. Enjoy!

All music provided by Audio Network and Warner Chappell Inc.  Used with permission

videos.title: Cherry Moscow Mule
videos.description:
CHERRY MOSCOW MULE
Servings: 1 drink

INGREDIENTS 
6 maraschino cherries
1 ounce lime juice
3 ounce vodka
6 ounce ginger beer
Edible flowers, to garnish

PREPARATION
1. In a glass, muddle maraschino cherries and lime juice.
2. Add vodka and stir.
3. In a copper mug, pour cherry mixture over ice and top it off with ginger beer.
4. Add edible flowers for garnish
5. Serve & enjoy!

All music provided by Audio Network and Warner Chappell Inc.  Used with permission

videos.title: Peach Iced Tea Whiskey
videos.description:
Here is what you'll need! #TastyHappyHour

INGREDIENTS 
Tea: 
8 cups boiling water
7-8 black tea bags
1 1/2 cups whiskey

Peach Simple Syrup:
2-3 fresh peaches, diced
1 cup sugar
1 cup water
1 lemon, juiced

Garnish:
1-2 peaches, sliced
1 lemon, sliced
Mint sprigs

PREPARATION 
1. In a large pitcher, pour hot water over tea bags letting steep 5 minutes. 
2. Bring syrup ingredients to boil, then reduce heat to medium.
3. Strain syrup through a fine strainer to remove fruit pieces.
4. Add syrup and whiskey to tea, then chill until ready to serve.
5. Serve over ice, with sliced peaches, sliced lemons and a mint sprig.

Music provided by Audio Network. Used with permission

videos.title: Blackberry Tequila Punch
videos.description:
Ingredients
12 oz blackberries
2 cups tequila
4 limes, sliced
4 mint sprigs
24 oz ginger beer
24 oz club soda

Instructions:

1. In a large bowl, crush blackberries into a pulpy mixture. Pour tequila, add sliced limes, mint sprigs and stir mixture.
2. Chill for at least 30 minutes.
3. Right before serving, pour cold ginger beer and club soda into the mixture. Enjoy!

Music: “Fresh Flow” provided by Warner Chappell. Used with permission.

videos.title: Boozy Bubbly Sherbet Punch
videos.description:
RECIPE:

Rainbow Sherbet
Fresh Raspberries 
6 ounces (half can) Fruit Punch Concentrate /thawed
6 ounces (half can) Pink/Raspberry Lemonade Concentrate /thawed
1 cup Vodka 
5 cups Ginger Ale /chilled
1 Bottle Champagne /chilled
Fresh Mint (optional)

Using cupcake liners in a muffin tin, fill each with 4-5 raspberries and top with a scoop of rainbow sherbet. Freeze until ready to serve (best if frozen for at least 2 hours).

In a large pitcher mix together the juice concentrates, raspberries, and vodka. Just before serving mix in the ginger ale. 

To serve - remove a sherbet scoop from the cupcake liner and place in a large mug. Fill halfway with punch, and finish with champagne. Garnish with fresh mint. Enjoy! 


Music provided by Warner Chappell Inc. Used with permission

videos.title: Pink Grapefruit Margaritas
videos.description:
Here is what you will need! 

RECIPE:

Makes 4 margaritas

Ingredients: 

1/4 cup simple syrup (recipe follows):
1/4 cup sugar
1/4 cup water

8 ruby red grapefruits
6 oz silver tequila
Sugar

In a saucepan, bring the 1/4 cup sugar and 1/4 cup water to a boil.  Wait until they’re completely combined, then set aside to cool.  Squeeze the juice out of all the grapefruits, and combine with the tequila and the simple syrup you just made.  Wet the rim of your glasses (you can do this with a slice of grapefruit), and dip in sugar.  Serve over ice!

Music provided by Warner Chappell Inc. Used with permission

videos.title: Raspberry Mojitos
videos.description:
Cheers to spring!

For each mojito that you want to make, you’ll need:

1/2 lime, cut into wedges
5-6 raspberries (a nice handful of ‘em)
1 spoonful of sugar
10-12 mint leaves (a good bunch)
2 ounces white rum
club soda 

Throw the lime wedges, raspberries, mint, and sugar into a glass and then, using a muddler or wooden spoon, press down on the ingredients to mush them all together and get all of the juice out of the lime wedges. Add ice and pour in rum (you can just eyeball the amount, if you don’t have something handy to measure) and then top the glass off with club soda. 

If you want it a little more or less sweet, you can always add slightly more or slightly less sugar. It’s also delicious with less rum, or no rum at all. Play around with the recipe and find the right ratio for you and your friends. All Tasty music provided by Audio Network and Warner Chappell Inc.  Used with permission

videos.title: Sparkling Strawberry-Kiwi Sangria
videos.description:
Make your own happy hour. Cheers!

Here’s what you’ll need:

1 lb strawberries
1 lb kiwis
1 cup light rum
1 bottle white wine (such as sauvignon blanc)
1 bottle sparkling wine, chilled (such as cava)
1 cup sugar
1 cup water
3 oranges
a pitcher or other large container

Directions:

Hull the strawberries and cut them in half. Peel the kiwis and cut them into slices.

Combine half of the halved strawberries, the sugar and water in a saucepan and turn the heat up to medium. Bring the mixture up to a boil and then let simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes, or until the strawberries seem like they’re about to fall apart. Let cool for a few minutes, and then, using a mesh sieve, strain the strawberry goodness into a bowl. Use a spoon to press the strawberries up against the mesh so you get every last beautiful drop of strawberry syrup. Place the syrup in the refrigerator to cool a bit.

Combine the kiwi slices and the remaining strawberries in a pitcher, and add the rum, white wine, strawberry syrup, and the juice of three oranges (in a pinch, you could also sub a few splashes of bottled orange juice, or even lemonade, for the fresh orange juice). Give it all a good stir and then pop the pitcher in the refrigerator for at least four hours to let all of the flavors come together.

When you’re ready to serve, add around three-quarters of the chilled sparkling wine to the pitcher. Pour into glasses and spoon in fruit, topping each glass off with a bit of the remaining champagne so it’s nice a bubbly when you hand the glass to a friend. Cheers!


MUSIC
Areia Groove
Licensed via Warner Chappell Production Music Inc. All Tasty music provided by Audio Network and Warner Chappell Inc.  Used with permission

videos.title: Homemade Frozen Margaritas
videos.description:
Check out our new Tasty Demais Facebook page! - http://on.fb.me/1PWwC7i

A super simple way to enjoy frozen margaritas at home.

Here’s what you’ll need:

750ml (25oz) tequila
1L (34oz) limemade (lemonade can also work in a pinch)
2 cups (16oz) orange juice
3-quart baking dish (or similar container)

Directions:
This recipe is super simple. Combine the tequila, limeade (or lemonade), and orange juice in your dish, give it a stir, and then pop it in the freezer for at least five hours. Once it’s frozen into a solid and you’re ready to serve, take out of the freezer and, using a spoon, scrape along the surface to pull up beautiful shards of frozen margarita (the motion is somewhere between scooping up ice cream and scraping off a car windshield in winter).

Feel free to play around with the ratio on this — it’ll work with a bit less tequila and more juice, or a bit more tequila and less juice (whatever kind of party you’re looking for). Salted rim totally optional. Enjoy! 

MUSIC
Licensed via Warner Chappell Production Music Inc. All Tasty music provided by Audio Network and Warner Chappell Inc.  Used with permission
